attributes.action: Introduce the European Union passport for those who want it
attributes.additional_details: Weaver people who wanted to stay at the time of referendum were not allowed to make our decisions public, for example, me I would have been 11 at the time of referendum I cannot have made my opinion onI the eu i think we should have been given all of the rights
attributes.background: or who cannot vote the rights and immunities of a European citizen while in V European Union including free movement of people

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who to offer an EU passport to are a matter for the EU, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Apply to Join the European Union (EU): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616636
